sentence.Network_en: The book is well bound with gold foil stamping, called blocking.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书大量采用称为装坯的金箔浮雕.

sentence.Network_en: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

sentence.Network_en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
sentence.Network_cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。
